entry.title: It's not Continuous Delivery if you can't deploy right now.
entry.content: I hear people say all the time that they're practicing continuous delivery. This declaration is often followed by something like, “I can let the security team know anytime”, or “I just have to run the performance tests”. If you can't push your software to production right now, you're not done with your continuous delivery journey.
